question: There are 82 third-graders at Maple Grove School. 73 of them are girls. On Friday, 8 third-grade girls and 8 third-grade boys were absent. How many third grade boys were at Maple Grove School on Friday?
answer:
Of the 82 third graders, 73 are girls, so 82 students - 73 girls = <<82-73=9>>9 boys.
On Friday there were 9 boys - 8 absent = <<9-8=1>>1 boys.
#### 1
